name: Mint-Basil Limeade
preparation:
Get all the flavor of a refreshing sipper minus the hangover with this easy-to-make mocktail.

This recipe originally appeared as part of “5 Essential Mocktails for the Best Kind of January Recovery.”

Gently muddle the basil, mint and simple syrup in a mixing tin, add ice, and shake until well-chilled.

Double-strain into a Collins glass over fresh ice.

Top with the soda water.

Garnish with a lime wheel.
